name: overview
content:
L1-Systems bring cutting edge intelligence solutions and services, which amongst others include:
  • Tactial and strategic Integration.
  • Analysis of HUMINT and SIGINT.
  • Cyber security for a range of intelligence solutions.

L1-Systems offer the complete range of intelligence gathering, analysis platforms and integration, from analytics, through sensors and integration platforms, to national backbone solutions.

name: Cyber Security
content:
L1-Systems assure national cyber security solutions for information assets, intelligence systems and critical infrastructure, utilizing military-grade technologies, strategies and practices, to protect sensitive databases, critical systems and vulnerable information.

L1-Systems have experience in creating secure cyber environments around federal facilities, eliminating communication of data and virtually securing the site.
  • Database Protection
  • Zero Day Threat Protection
  • Smart Fences
  • Intelligent Cyber Security Software
  • Intelligence Backbone Cyber Security
  • Motion Detectors
  • Virtual Cyber Perimeter (Signal Jamming)
  • Critical System Protection

name: Intelligence Integration
content:
L1-Systems develop and deploy intelligence command and control solutions, which constantly enables the interception and integration of different platforms into one master network.
  • HUMINT - Building information gathering networks based on human agents and operators.
  • SIGINT - Automatic collection of electronic data from jammers, radio transmissions, cellular networks, all EW emissions, etc.
  • OSINT - Automatic online detectors, identifying patterns of interest online, in open media sources, social networks, discussion forums and more.

name: Analytics
content:
L1-Systems provide analyzing gathered information and turning gigabytes of data into actionable intelligence solutions through applications.

Our advanced analytics enable authorities and intelligence organizations to make sense out of data using solutions such as:
  • Semantic analysis
  • Geonalysis
  • Trend analysis

name: Intelligence C&C
content:
L1-Systems provide national level Command and Control centers that enable authorities from any level to see, understand and respond to events as they wish.

Utilizing our advanced intelligence gathering and analytics capabilities, the Intelligence C&C provides advanced warnings about impending threats, letting authorities prepare for and respond to events on-demand.
